definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: It is exactly based on this consideration that President Abdoulaye Wade made the correct decision to resume diplomatic ties with China.
sentences.chinese: 正是基于此，瓦德总统作出了同中国复交的正确决定。

sentences.english: Li said that China-Lesotho ties have forged ahead smoothly since the resumption of diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星说，中莱复交以来，两国关系发展顺利。

definition: abbr. for 聯合國大會|联合国大会[Lian2 he2 guo2 Da4 hui4], United Nations General Assembly/abbr. for 國立西南聯合大學|国立西南联合大学[Guo2 li4 Xi1 nan2 Lian2 he2 Da4 xue2], National Southwest Combined University
